clues.text: Yeah, baby!  Meaning "magnificent", this Texas-sounding name comes with certain "Powers"

This feminine form of Rex is from the Latin for "queen"
This Welsh form of Margaret was among the USA's top 10 girls' names of the 1990s
Previously attached to Theo- & Isa-, it became popular by itself after appearing in "David Copperfield"

:-*

:-b..
Doing this means either you're hungry or you're a pig

If you're triskaidekaphobic, you're afraid of this number, & not just on a Friday

rounds.comments: (Alex: ...and it's the writer we want you to name.  We'll give you the words.)

clues.text: "I beheld the wretch--the miserable monster whom I had created"

This candy bar with a "chic street" name has been around since 1936

rounds.text: It's the only U.S. coin or bill produced in 2010 that features the private home of a president on the reverse
